translations: n．梦魇（复数形式）：传说中的恶魔，据说在夜间对睡眠中的人施加压力，使其感到恐惧。
· She was haunted by incubuses in her dreams.
她的梦中总是被梦魇所困扰。

sentences.sentence: They did not spend two years of their life working for "hope" and "change" only to see the Clintons and their various incubuses and succubuses restored to power.
sentences.translation: 他们任劳任怨付出两年的努力是为了“希望”和“改变”，而不是为了看到克林顿和一般人马重掌大权。
